name: 林鈞陶
objective:
This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) transmission.
Course outline:
1. Linear Algebra and Matrix analysis.
2. Wireless channel modeling. 
3. Single-Antenna Wireless Communications.
4. Multiple-Antenna Wireless Communications.
